detail_desc: Long-sleeved body in lace and mesh with a V-neck, mesh side sections and press-studs at the crotch. Lined bust.
Long-sleeved body in lace and mesh with a V-neck, mesh side sections and press-studs at the crotch. Lined bust.
Short, wide top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with appliqués at the top, dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves. Raw, roll edges at the sleeves and hem.

Short dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a frill-trimmed opening at the back and button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip in one side, long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem. Double-layered bodice at the front and short jersey lining skirt.
